checker.matching
Class LicenseMatcher

java.lang.Object
  checker.matching.LicenseMatcher

public class LicenseMatcher
extends java.lang.Object

Reads extracted comments from a source file and returns any matching licenses.

Field Detail

MIN_MATCH_LENGTH_WORDS

private static final int MIN_MATCH_LENGTH_WORDS
Minimum number of words per matched segment. Segments with fewer words are filtered out.

matchLicenseExact

private static java.util.ArrayList<LicenseMatch> matchLicenseExact(License l,
                                                                   WordList comments,
                                                                   WordList license)
Perform exact string matching for given comments. Arguments l, license and licenseWords must be the same License. They are separated only to allow proper caching. Same with comments and commentsWords.

Parameters:
l - License (forbidden phrase) to compare
comments - Source file comments in a WordList
license - License words in a WordList
commentWords - Source file comment words in a String[]
licenseWords - License words in a String[]
Returns:
List of found matches

matchLicenseDiff

private static LicenseMatch matchLicenseDiff(License l,
                                             WordList comments,
                                             WordList license,
                                             java.lang.String[] commentsWords,
                                             java.lang.String[] licenseWords,
                                             double minMatch)
Perform Diff and DiffAnalysis for given comments. Arguments l, license and licenseWords must be the same License. They are separated only to allow proper caching. Same with comments and commentsWords.

Parameters:
l - License to compare
comments - Source file comments in a WordList
license - License words in a WordList
commentsWords - Source file comment words in a String[]
licenseWords - License words in a String[]
minMatch - Minimum match percentage (0.0 .. 1.0)
Returns:
Found match or null

cutMatch

static LicenseMatch cutMatch(LicenseMatch match,
                             LicenseMatch cut,

Cut fragment 'cut' away from fragment 'match'. Word list is needed for counting word positions.

This implementation is really ugly, feel free to clean it up though.

Parameters:

cut -
commentWords -

filterMatches

static java.util.ArrayList<LicenseMatch> filterMatches(java.util.ArrayList<LicenseMatch> matchList,
                                                       WordList commentWords)
Filter found License matches. Remove overlapping matches and too short fragments.

Parameters:
matchList - Input, list of matches
commentWords - Source data for calculating match locations
Returns:
List of matches after filtering

match

public static java.util.ArrayList<LicenseMatch> match(java.util.ArrayList<CommentLine> comments,
                                                      java.util.AbstractCollection<License> licenses,
                                                      LicenseMatcher.MatchAlgorithm algorithmID,
                                                      double minMatch)
Performs a match for multiple licenses agains given comments.

Parameters:
comments - List of comments.
licenses - Licenses that the match will be done against.
algorithmID - The algorithm that will be used (ignored)
minMatch - Minimum match percentage to include in matches, in range 0.0 .. 1.0
Returns:
Found matches, never null.

match

public static LicenseMatch match(java.util.ArrayList<CommentLine> comments,
                                 License license,
                                 LicenseMatcher.MatchAlgorithm algorithmID)
Performs a match agains given comments.

Parameters:
comments - List of comments.
license - License that the match will be done agains.
algorithmID - The algorithm that will be used
Returns:
Found matches, null if comments contain no words.

Returns:
